5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressed! well packaged, great product, fast delivery., 7 Dec. 2014
By 
Sarah - See all my reviews
Verified Purchase(What is this?)
This review is from: Minotaur Matte Anti Glare Screen Protector Pack for Apple iPhone 5/5S/5C (6 Screen Protectors) (Electronics)
I was very impressed with product especially for the price!
The one I ordered was for the iphone 5c and it fits perfectly as long as you are careful with lining it up with the speaker/camera hole and button. Gives a good matte finish and I've not had a single problem with sensitivity. I don't understand how a previous review says it didn't stick? I find these stick better than others I have tried which have tended to peel up at the edges. I've had mine on for 2+weeks now and it still looks as good as the day I applied it. I've also got a slight scratch on my screen which you can't even tell is there with the screen protector on.
It comes smartly packaged with 6 screen protectors, a small piece of stiff card to help with application and 2 microfiber cloths (the proper one you get with glasses etc. I've bought more expensive screen protectors before that have said would come with microfiber cloths and they have been very cheap almost felt paper types so I was very pleased with that).
The instructions were very clear it took me 2 attempts to fit mine correctly but that was mainly due to my dog jumping up and getting dog hair everywhere the first time.

I highly recommend and I will buy again!
Although at this rate I don't see me changing the screen protector any time soon so there's a good chance this one pack might last me till my next upgrade.
I won't hesitate to try other products from this range if the need arises.
